### 6:00 AM - Wake up and complete morning routine

* Shower and dress for the day

* Watch TV or play video games
* Spend time on personal hobbies or interests

### 10:00 PM - Bedtime routine

* Brush teeth and hair
* Get into bed and turn off electronic devices
